snippet.title: Actavis to buy Forest Labs in $25 billion deal
snippet.description: Actavis PLC plans to buy Forest Laboratories Inc. for about $25 billion, catapulting little-known Actavis into the world's No. 15 drugmaker, with an unusual one-stop-shopping model giving it an edge: more face time with doctors. U.S. physicians, increasingly crunched for time, keep reducing how many drugmaker sales reps

snippet.title: Maxine Gilboy | Pianist brought audiences to tears
snippet.description: Those who knew Maxine Gilboy describe her as a woman with the talent and grace of old Hollywood, and the spunk and spontaneity of Vaudeville. Those who knew Maxine Gilboy describe her as a woman with the talent and grace of old Hollywood, and the spunk and spontaneity of Vaudeville.
